DOC.brief_summary: The goal study examine patient undergoing incision drainage cutaneous abscess determine routine packing abscess cavity affect need intervention repeat incision drainage , antibiotic administration hospital admission .
DOC.detailed_description: Study protocol : 1 . Identification patient cutaneous abscess require incision drainage 2 . Written consent obtain patient 3 . Study material obtain - Enrolling physician fill pre-procedure information ( see data sheet ) - Enrollment data sheet instruction indicate whether patient receive pack - Use random number generator randomize packet - Provider abscess incision drainage without pack accord instruction - Enrolling physician fill post-procedure information ( see data sheet ) - Patient return within 48 hour wound check removal packing perform - Research coordinator study physician call patient within 14 30 day procedure follow-up - Information return visit and/or telephone follow-up
DOC.criteria: 1 . All patient 18 year age 2 . Patients require cutaneous abscess incision drainage 3 . Englishspeaking subject 1 . Unable return 48hour followup . 2 . Patients admit hospital go operating room incision drainage 3 . Pregnant patient 4 . Patients le 18 year age 5 . Prisoners person police custody 6 . Patients infect bursa 7 . NonEnglish speaking subject
